sentences.en: " And that may be an underestimate, " admits Anderson.
sentences.cn: 他认为: “ 这个数字可能被低估了.

sentences.en: Classically, overweight people underestimate the volume of food that they consume.
sentences.cn: 一般来说，超重的人往往低估自己摄入食物的量。

sentences.en: Don't underestimate him. He looks stupid but he has great intelligence.
sentences.cn: 别低估他, 他看起来愚笨,其实很聪明.

sentences.en: Don't underestimate the role of theory.
Fourteen percent may be an underestimate.
He was a smart operator. Don't underestimate him.
sentences.cn: 他这个人精明圆滑，可别小瞧了他。

sentences.en: His cunning and guile were not attributes I would ever underestimate.
sentences.cn: 我从未对他的狡猾和奸诈掉以轻心。

sentences.en: I think a lot of people still underestimate him.
sentences.cn: 我觉得很多人仍然低估了他。

sentences.en: I underestimate the distance, and am exhausted.
sentences.cn: 没想到这么远, 我可累坏了.

sentences.en: It was easy to underestimate him because of his occasionally ponderous manner.
sentences.cn: 由于他偶尔现出的沉闷的姿态,很容易使人小看了他.

sentences.en: Never underestimate the power of the press.
sentences.cn: 绝不要低估新闻界的力量。

sentences.en: Never underestimate what you can learn from a group of like-minded people.
sentences.cn: 千万不要低估你从一群志趣相投的人那里所能学到的东西。

sentences.en: Never underestimate your opponent, ie think that you will beat him easily.
None of us should ever underestimate the degree of difficulty women face in career advancement.
sentences.cn: 我们谁都不应该低估女性在事业发展过程中所面临的困难程度。

sentences.en: The worst thing you can do is underestimate an opponent.
sentences.cn: 最严重的错误就是低估对手。

sentences.en: to underestimate the cost of the project

sentences.cn: 我们常常低估自己的潜力。

sentences.en: We underestimated how long it would take to get there.
sentences.cn: 我们低估了到那里所需的时间。

trans.tran_cn: 低估，估计不足，过低评价，过低估价，轻视
trans.tran_en: a guessed amount or number that is too low
to think or guess that something is smaller, cheaper, easier etc than it really is

trans.tran_cn: 低估，对…估计不足，看轻，把…的价值估计过低
trans.tran_en: to think or guess that something is smaller, cheaper, easier etc than it really is
to think or guess that something is smaller, cheaper, easier etc than it really is
